Desc.entry: Helps young people through fostering their spirit of adventure, their self confidence, developing their qualities of leadership and helping them become good citizens of the future. Organises community projects and Duke of Edinburgh Award. Involved in BTEC and NVQ qualifications.

Address.entry: HQ South and West Yorkshire Wing Air Training Corps

ContactName.entry: Squadron Leader Espie, Wing Executive Officer

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
